comment: 'Chai?' the message I have sent you insane no of times. So glad that we managed to find each other. My lost twin. Jsyk I hate accidents except when we went from 'batchmates' to this (haha reverence to Taylor). Just remember it always stays. Love you xoxo.
name: Ayushi Agrawal

comment: Chai? Bluff? Gossips? Trip? You're in for everything. You are one of the best people of this whole journey, and I have spent most of the memorable moments with you. Thanks for 506 (Best thing that happened to me). Hope you will stay like this forever! Btw Konichiva  k alawa bhi kuch seekha aur🤥
name: Pranjali Gavhale

comment: You make everyone feel included. I am gonna miss our gossip sessions. Thoda jyada soya kr pagli. Japan jaake hume bhul mat jaana. Grateful to have been able to know you. I am gonna miss you Mani. Love you.
name: Kanishka Goyal

comment: "Our Chatterbox! What I love most? Your effortless way of making everyone comfortable when they talk to you.. Iska humne faida bhi uthaya h sab jagah tujhe aghe bhej k iykyk😜. Lucky to find you. Gonna miss our late-night gossip, cooking, scooty rides and our nafees's biryani. Keep shining.! Luv u ❤
name: Monal Pawar

comment: We're fallin apart still we hold together, we pass the ends so we chase forever cz this is all we know
name: Sahil Singh Shekhawat

comment: Chapar chapar ki dukan, kyo karti he tu itni bakwas. Jab bhi kisi anjan logon ke beech me jana ho, all I hope is kashh tu ho sath, situation awkward nhi hone deti. So many ups and downs still whenevr you are there it feels amazingly good. The greatest photogenic always keep smiling. ❤️.
name: Diwakar Soni

comment: Mani Darling teri daant m v pyaar h or mere ko wo pyaar bahut mila h😅First window se u were there always till the very end u r there. Bahut kam log h which I can count on u are on of them🥰 ki I feel if I will need u will be there chaahe raat se subah ho jae. Japan jaa k bhul mt jaiyo Will miss u
name: Shreya Singh

comment:
Mr. Chintu from WhiteHat Jr., it's been a long journey.. Bade waale phone se raaat bhar meeting me bkc krne se lekar gussa Roti ko manane tk, you did a lot for me. Thanks for everything.. Kaha suna sb maaf.
Be safe n Always be Happy.
name: Rohit singh

comment: The vibe setter of the group.Tere hone se alag hi level ki energy aa jaati h group mein.First person I met with so much open heart and wanna be friends with everyone. Will remember all the trips we had together, the artpark jahaan saath m moye moye hua thha and so much more.All the best for future !
name: Arush Pradhan

comment: Hey Mani❤️… ik i dont say this very often but i love you and your extremely adorable personality. I always want to see you smiling cause i just love ur beautifully perfect smile. Thankyou for the constant reminder of not to overthink and complicate life & treating me as ur own baccha. Best wishes ❤️
name: Monika

comment: "Hi, Manisha" bolu ya "haaaye, Manisha" bolu..? Mujhe abhi bhi FY ka wo call yaad hai jispe tune aur Aditi ne sunaya tha, aur uske baad to yaadon ka pitara bharne lag gya.. I will always remember your laugh and your signature dance step(iykyk).. BKC karte rahiyo.. see you in Japan, Mani..
name: Dhairya Mistry

comment:
Hey dood.. you know ig ill never forget your voice. You were always the most vibrant person whether its abt dp or irl. a gem of our batch.
See you rule Japan or wherever u enter!! fly high Manisha didi. Stay connected.
name: Kailaash pandiyan

comment:
Manisha Di
You’re awesome
You’re always a great person to be around and an even better friend to have!!
I’ve learnt so much from you in E-Summit ‘22 and TEDx23.
I wish you well for all your future adventures.
Live the anime life you wanted, and it’s easy, just call them Ching-1, Ching-2 and so on!!!
name: Manya Jain

comment: One of my first friends from college. insane, crazy, always smiling and helping others. Japan mein mere lie Robotics compnies p spy karti rhio aur acha idea mile to bta dena idhar start kardunga. Hehe. Wish you all the best
name: Srijan Parashar

comment:
Been a scammer from online to offline and always will be.
Japan ka flight ticket or visa bhej Dena vro.
name: Amarnath K

comment:
"Hemlo Guys" tere saath itni masti Kari hai. Some of the best moments of college life have been with you 🌻🌻. Thanks for being FRIENDS 🫂🫂.
PS I hope popcorn enjoy karne ke aur mauke mile😈😈.
name: Ayush

comment: Hey my CR friend ! I know things are falling apart now , but wanna tell you that u were onw of the true personalities i saw in college. No hidden masks , No filter just the way you are. I know with time humari friendship shayd thodi kam si hogyi but i will always have great respect for you
name: Sujal Patel

comment: Hey MS! Online meets, Discord music, & "Tu hi meri dost", Campus walks, tapri, tumhara roz daant khana, fir bhi slef-care na krna & wheelchair. Senator didi ka khauf & pyar. Dedicated, Composed, Caring & Innocent. I really adore our bond. Stay in touch always. ATB for Banda to Japan. Proud of u.
name: Vishal Chichani

comment: Thanks for making me part of TEDx! It felt like life found its right track since then. Your energy during projects kept boredom at bay. The cool things we did were unforgettable! You effortlessly connect with everyone; I aspire to that. Wishing you a life full of happiness and fun ahead! 🌟😊
name: Jaydeep Umarya

comment: Hey there, Miss Popular. While I stepped foot on campus for the first time, not knowing anyone, I quickly got to know you xP. You're one of a kind, with strong skills, ambition and motivation. Don’t forget to take care of yourself and I wish you all the best for the future!
name: Alan Jose

comment: Mujhse bhi badi extrovert. Apna instrumentation k project k time Wali bkc bhot sahi thi. Aur thank you us time mujhe accident k baad treatment dene k liye wrna me mar skta tha 😂 iykyk. All the best. Keep in touch. Japan ja k bhool mt jana is Indian dost ko.
name: Abhijit Joshi

comment: i will miss ur accent of calling me 'jeetu bhaiya' 😁😅...the richest girl of our branch 🌚# japan...
name: Jitendra Kumar

comment: Hats off to the efforts you and the team put in choreographing me for the EBSB '22 Garba performance 😀. It was a memorable event for me as performing with you and other team members on the stage was helpful in removing my stage fear. Wish you all the success in the future. Good luck! 👍
name: Dhruvil Thakkar (DT)

comment: Sabki ladkiyon ki darling, tedx ki co-0C, Chai ki , sorry black tea ki brand ambasssador. "Bhai chai peene chalyte hai" line ki patentee. Sab sahi hai bas, Bas YES & No karna seekhle. Baaki sab 1st class hai. RIC me Japan se bulaaae the ab khud japan jaane wali hai. Stay connected & Blessed🥰
name: Saurabh Yadav

comment:
Hello bro..

The most simple and loving of all.. maintain your super good and jolly nature .. and I'll always be a call away.. hope to c u soon
name: Khushbu Lalwani

comment: Bro, how can I ever forget our first window days 🤌🤌🥹, and I'll also not forget how you wrote my name in close contact just bcz I put a tablet on ur flat table 🥲😂😂. Ahh, good old days. Don't again try to get ppl into quarantine just bcz you want friends and all the best for ur future, bro 😂🥹✌
name: K Madhumitha

comment: We didn't talk much but made some good memories working with you on E-Summit. Looking forward to seeing you upscale the Japanese in you and teach some Japanese LOL. Wish you the best of luck.
name: V Rajkumar Thomas

comment: One of the very first friends in my college life who played a major role in helping me adjust to new normal. Our online days were the best. She herself mingles very easily into any group and brings something to it. Looking forward to be colleagues with you. Arigatou!
name: Shankar Nakka

comment: Gawar hai tu ekdum. Kuch bhi karti ho but at the end resourceful enough to get everything right in life. Will miss knowing about ur decisions,Messier than my room,time to time & having to deliver a lecture. Hope the weeb inside u is excited for Japan. Love you, will miss seeing u around.All the best
name: Aditi T
